commit.message:
2003-05-10  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	* java/nio/CharBuffer.java
	(put): Fixed precondtion check.
	(toString): Make it work without backing array.
	(put): Skip one level of method calling.

From-SVN: r66656
